name: Deano Evil Hear No Evil
description:
BROWSER VERSION MAY HAVE AUDIO ISSUES - WINDOWS USERS RECCOMEND DOWNLOADING

Originally meant to be a commission, now a personal project for a good mate. A weird, janky tribute to the man and his many musical projects. 

Find the 4 speakers, drown out the trash. Speaker 4 should be a little harder to find, but it's there.

Controls:

WASD - walk

SHIFT - hold to run

SPACE- jump

MOUSE/TRACKPAD - look around
